name: A Dragon's Tale (Saturn91, Luziver)
description:
Hello stranger

This is our submission to the ManaSoup GameJam 2021.

The theme of the GameJam was: Once upon a time....


Controlls

Movement: ASDW

Fire the Dragon: Left and Right Mouse

The Story

Once upon a time...
... a happy couple of little dragons lived their lives in peaceful harmony.
They played all the day and night without disturbing anyone.
Rarely the couple entered a village.
It was very lovely till...
„Dragons have great magic power“ spoke the orc leader to the elvs.
All the folks gathered to capture one of the scaly ones.
the couple was torn apart. One dragon alone wouldn’t be a happyend, so lets...

UNLEASH THE MIGHT OF THE DRAGONS!!!

Contributors:

Saturn91 -> Developer & Gamedesign
Luziver -> Art & Gamedesign
Ducknetic -> SFX & Video / Music
ikeifi -> Developer Duck & Consultant


Copy rights
